|vendor_id = 015f |device_id = 000a |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = LDK102040 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:07:0E, 00:0A:8A
|chip1 = Cisco;; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/27/2000 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 746320504872 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B00006HOZB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Singapore

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is part of the '''Cisco Aironet 350 Series'''. :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps6442/ps4555/ps448/product_data_sheet09186a0080088828.html '''Aironet 350 Series''' product page]
[http://web.archive.org/web/20060209123249/http://www.mrx.com.au/wireless/AironetModifications.htm Adding an external antenna to a Cisco Aironet 350 (via archive.org)]
Additional specifcations, per the '''[[Cisco]]''' product page, follow...
